alert.note: Alert for Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 2:50PM MST until March 11 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow, moderate to heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches with locally higher amounts above 8000 feet, particularly along Highway 50 near Cerro Summit. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Upper Gunnison River Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Generally 6 to 8 inches of snow has already fallen, resulting in slick, snowpacked roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
